name: Getting Out (Kevin Hutchins)
description:
You are in the depths of a dungeon. Will you find you way out?

A standalone expansion to Deeper and Deeper, a game jam game I made earlier this year. Mostly just a way for me to play around without generating outdoor scenes. Don't expect it to be great or notably different from the original game. I was making this against a deadline. 

Controls

MoveWASDLookMouseTalk/Close TextF

Getting Out is the final game I made for 2019 as a goal to make one game a month. It wasn't an entirely successful goal, but was more successful than I anticipated.  I did make 12 games, even if many of them were derivative.

I would have liked to differentiate the levels more, and there's a strange bug that only shows up in builds where you fall through the floor, but I'm way too close to my deadline and I've been working too long today, so it's out.
